name: cloudsmith storage!
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if usage is over 85%, `WARNING` if usage is over 75%, otherwise returns `OK`.

name: cloudsmith bandwidth!
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if usage is over 85%, `WARNING` if usage is over 75%, otherwise returns `OK`

name: Can Connect
description: Returns CRITICAL if the Agent cannot connect to Cloudsmith to collect metrics, otherwise returns `OK`
